channel.title: [508] Is it possible? [508] Just look! (not custom items)
channel.description: hello, i am (or atleast i think i am) in the right section, i wanted to know if it was possible to get the new hp bars on 508 clients. And also if it is possible to add the new click menus (right click things). Same with new hit splats if you wouldn't guess. Please tell me if you know, or know where to go... would love it!

item.title: [508] Is it possible? [508] Just look! (not custom items)
item.dc:creator: @L0ST_PK3R L0ST PK3R
item.description:
@L0ST_PK3R wrote:

i know now lol, go to Sprites if it’s 317… Then look for images, ECT Pvp skulls, but you’ll find the hp bar, you gewt to customize it or change it on paint or what ever you want to do with it, if you cant ind the custom HP bar, i recomend doing what i told you to above.

Read full topic
